prodNameC: “西門子”特異免疫球蛋白E試劑組
prodNameE: ADVIA Centaur for Specific IgE (sIgE) Assay
ingredientsDesc:
產品	組成	處方
ADVIA Centaur sIgE	lite reagentsolid phase	lite reagent: streptavidin (~64 ug/mL) labeled with acridinium ester in buffer with HSA and sodium azide (<0.1%)solid phase: monoclonal mouse anti-human IgE antibody (62.5 ug/mL) covalently coupled to paramagnetic particles in in buffer with HSA and sodium azide (<0.1%)
sIgE calibrator	low calibratorhigh calibratorreference allergen	calibrators: Birch polle (Betula verrucosa) specific IgE antibodies in human serum (High) or IgE-free human serum (Low) with sodium azide (<0.1% after recostitution)reference allergen: Biotinylated recombinant major birch pollen allergen (Bet v 1) in phosphate buffer with HAS and sodium azide (<0.1%)
ADVIA Centaur Allergy Screen (ALSCRN)	lite reagentsolid phaseallergy screen reagentlow ALSCRN calibratorhigh ALSCRN calibrator	lite reagent: streptavidin (~0.64 ug/mL) labeled with acridinium ester in buffer with HSA, protein stabilizers and sodium azide (<0.1%)solid phase: monoclonal mouse anti-human IgE antibody (~31.3 ug/mL) co
applicantAddr: 台北市南港區園區街３號８樓
efficacy: 使用於ADVIA Centaur系統，定量測定血清或血漿中特異免疫球蛋白E(SIgE)抗體。
mdFormat: (1) ADVIA Centaur sIgE (200 tests)(2) sIgE Calibrator (0.5 mL/vial)(3) ADVIA Centaur Allergy Screen (ALSCRN) ( 50 tests)(4) ADVIA Centaur Probe Wash 1 (12.5 mL/pack)
